activities: Our system will hold the following data for Human Resource purposes, to be exclusively used internally for the purposes of scheduling employees to work in shifts. Employee ID number, Employee Name, Date of Hire, JobClass (what job the employee performs), Hourly Rate of Pay, Available  Hours to work in a week, Gender, Phone Number (used for communicating scheduling changes).
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: TRUSTe EU Safe Harbor is available to investigate unresolved complaints other than those pertaining to human resources data.   For unresolved complaints pertaining to human resources data, UniFocus agrees to refer the matter with the EU data protection authorities.
